original_text: These false teachers have left the way which is good and right. Like Balaam, Beor's son, they have gone the wrong way. Balaam wanted money so much that he did wrong things to get it.
korean_text: 그들이 바른 길을 떠나 미혹되어 브올의 아들 발람의 길을 따르는도다 그는 불의의 삯을 사랑하다가

sentences.original_text: These false teachers have left the way
sentences.korean_translation: 이 거짓 교사들은 그 길을 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: they have gone the wrong way
that he did wrong things to get it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그것을 얻기 위해 잘못된 일을 했습니다
